netPROXY Package - HIF Interface

Version V1.2.3.0

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-57: Use Hilscher Definitions for netPROXY HIF Packets
  • PSNPXHIF-59: Remove OSAL Dependency from netPROXY Object Header
  • PSNPXHIF-61: Update netPROXY Core to V2.2.2.0
  • PSNPXHIF-62: Update netPROXY Common Communication Package to V2.0.1.0

Version V1.2.2.0

Bugs:

  • PSNPXHIF-56: Behavior object starts timeout timer from wrong context

Version V1.2.1.0

Bugs:

  • PSNPXHIF-42: HIF does write the full instance of the Input and Output Trigger.
  • PSNPXHIF-43: Acknowledge handshakes after data exchange on finish Input/Output Trigger
  • PSNPXHIF-50: Wrong Check for Element Byte Size for Writing Objects
  • PSNPXHIF-51: It is not possible to create adapter multiple times
  • PSNPXHIF-52: Update netPROXY core to V2.2.1.0
  • PSNPXHIF-53: Adapter does not activate its resources if DPM channed disabled
  • PSNPXHIF-54: Object List not Processed

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-41: Remove Hif-status update notification from cyclical path
  • PSNPXHIF-47: Used Hilscher Definitions for Identifier
  • PSNPXHIF-49: ASYNC-API shall be used for Reading and Writing Objects

New Features:

  • PSNPXHIF-45: Introduce packet handling for behavior implementation on host side
  • PSNPXHIF-46: Implement Result Codes for netPROXY HIF Package
  • PSNPXHIF-48: implement timer functionality in the HIF packet handler thread

Version V1.2.0.1

Bugs:

  • PSNPXHIF-50: Wrong Check for Element Byte Size for Writing Objects

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-47: Used Hilscher Definitions for Identifier

New Features:

  • PSNPXHIF-46: Implement Result Codes for netPROXY HIF Package

Version V1.2.0.0

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-35: Remove Read/Write Lock for HIF Status Object
  • PSNPXHIF-36: Reduce Update Rate for Object List
  • PSNPXHIF-39: Update netPROXY Core to V2.2.0.0
  • PSNPXHIF-40: Update Common Communication Package to V1.2.0.0

New Features:

  • PSNPXHIF-37: Add support for netX90 and netX400

Version V1.1.4.0

Bugs:

  • PSNPXHIF-33: Wrong Data Size Information

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-30: Add Worker for Updating Process Data
  • PSNPXHIF-31: Add Complier Switch for ASYNC/SYNC Reading and Writing Objects

Version V1.1.3.0

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-29: Optimize HIF Object Mapping

New Features:

  • PSNPXHIF-28: Implement Configuration Object for Input- and Output Trigger Behavior

Version V1.1.2.0

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-17: Remove Definitions for none configurable Number of Instances from Public Header
  • PSNPXHIF-18: Improve Searching for Matching HIF-Mapping
  • PSNPXHIF-20: Change Process Data Buffer from Triple-Buffer to Single-Buffer
  • PSNPXHIF-21: Implement Release Configuration Function for HIF Configuration
  • PSNPXHIF-22: Provide Offset for Object Status Bytes
  • PSNPXHIF-23: Trigger Input and Output for external Trigger Sources
  • PSNPXHIF-24: Improve Updating of netPROXY Object List
  • PSNPXHIF-25: Update netPROXY Core to V2.1.9.0

Version V1.1.1.0

Changes:

  • PSNPXHIF-5: Update project structure
  • PSNPXHIF-6: Implement Triple Buffer for Cyclic Process Data
  • PSNPXHIF-9: Improve Package Deinitialization
  • PSNPXHIF-10: Remove not Appropriate stuff and Revise Package
  • PSNPXHIF-12: Rework Packet Allignent
  • PSNPXHIF-14: Implement Worker Thread
  • PSNPXHIF-15: Disable Object Cache
  • PSNPXHIF-16: Update netPROXY Core to V2.1.8.0
